name: Walking Cradles
description:
Show off your classic side with the Frances pump 
from Walking Cradles. A Tiny Pillows footbed keeps you supported 
from work to an elegant evening out.

name: Cordone Indico Sneaker
description:
Reach new heights in the Cordones Indio. 
These low-cut lace up platform sneakers have a cushioned insole 
and vulcanized construction created for increased flexibility 
and durability.

Low-cut casual lace up
Canvas upper
100% vegan
Comfort insole
Vulcanized construction
Custom rubber outsole design
Approx. 1 1/9" heel

name: Nike Air Max 95 Essential Recycled Felt
description:
The Nike Air Max 95 Essential Recycled Felt combines the best of head-turning style 
with Nike’s innovative ability to create the best shoes using recycled materials. 
The upper features a blend of felt, mesh, and synthetic leather. Developed for 
performance running, the shoe also features Nike Air cushioning and a robust 
design that enhances durability. The Nike Grind rubber outsole, also made using 
recycled materials, is sturdy and offers great traction. The rich layers and 
textures of the shoe are inspired by the human body; the midsole representing 
the spine, the panels as muscles, and the laces as ribs. Let your human DNA 
match your running DNA with these new sneakers.

name: Botas Lug Sneaker
description:
A sole that shows up for you. The Botas Lug pairs a durable, utilitarian-inspired 
lug outsole with our best-selling lace-up silhouette.

Black textile upper
Custom TOMS rubber outsole
OrthoLite® Eco LT insole for lightweight cushioning 
made with plant derived and recycled materials.
Lace-up closure
Approx. 1 3/8" heel

name: Mallory Flat
description:
A timeless loafer silhouette with a modern flare. The Mallory is a casual, 
all-occasion flat with all-day comfort.

Tan mini cheetah print
Leather and sude upper
Premium canvas sockliner
Thermoplastic rubber outsole
OrthoLite® Eco X40 insole for high-rebound, long-term cushioning made with 
plant derived and recycled materials.
Non-removable insole
Approx. 1" heel

name: Nike Reposto
description:
New model, new features, but same comfort and even better style
A new silhouette with familiar features! The Nike Air Max 2090 is a 
tribute to the legendary Air Max 90, which has dominated the sneaker 
market for several years. So it is clear that the new style of the 
Air Max 2090 is even more striking! A cool overlay look determines 
the design of the 2090 and is a real eye-catcher thanks to skillfully 
set seam details that also stand out in color. Of course, the 
visible Air element in the sole of an Air Max should not be missing!
 A structured heel area and a practical heel loop complete the look of the Nike Max 2090
